name: Wildfire (post jam)
description:
ORIGINAL JAM VERSION:

https://dancar.itch.io/wildfire

Improvements from the jam version:

  • Improved level generation to decrease the changes of generating tiles of same type next to each other
  •  UI tweaks
  • Display water puddles on wet tiles
  • Confirmation dialog when pressing end turn without spending all action points

How to play:

Protect the forests from the wildfire!

- Move the raincloud around by selecting it and clicking on a highlighted tile to move.

- Move the cloud to water tiles to absorb water using the "DRAIN" ability. You can store rain like this up to 3 times before you need to release it!

- Move to tiles on fire and use the "RAIN" ability to put out fires.

- Move to grass or forest tiles and use the "RAIN" ability to make them resistant to fire.
